sentence: Representative Madison Cawthorn (R., N.C.) recently called Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky a thug? and said the Ukrainian government is evil,? according to a newly surfaced video.
author: Brittany Bernstein
title: Madison Cawthorn Calls Zelensky a Thug,' Accuses Ukrainian Government of Pushing Woke Ideologies'

sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) is having a moment ... and not exactly a good one.
author: Brigid Kennedy
title: Cawthorn primary challengers respond after lawmaker calls Zelensky 'a thug'
